Claim: "A man is digging a hole on the beach."
Implication: "A man is digging a hole on the beach while wearing a black tank top."
Referring expressions: Man, hole, beach  Man, hole, beach, black tank top
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsDigging(a) and IsOnBeach(b)))) -> (exists d (exists a (IsWearing(d) and IsDigging(a))))
